scc.releaseInfo:
For All Platform * Updated DISA STIG SCAP content for April 2021 * Fixed several issues with command-line scanning of offline Cisco IOS XE configuration files * Updated SCC's libssh2 module to resolve CVE-2019-17498 * Updated XML parsing to prevent loading any external entities * Updated SCC's Libxml2 module
For Windows * Updated Windows host file creation to prevent application hang on very large domains * Updated AppCmd and AppCmdListConfig based on upcoming OVAL release
For Linux * Added STIG Benchmark for RHEL8 * Updated GPG key for signing RPM's to use SHA256 for RHEL8
For Mac OS X * Updated NIST SCAP content for Catalina and Big Sur
